column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Love this place
column2: not the wait though. Waited a good hour and a half on a Saturday morning
column3: but I guess that it's expected. Had their wildberry pancakes which were AMAZING and also their chorizo skillet which was a bit on the oily side
column4: but it was so tasteful. Amazing service. You must try it out if you're visiting Chicago!
